news.headline: EXCLUSIVE: Glossier Names Colin Walsh CEO
news.summary: Walsh, who most recently helmed Procter & Gamble's beauty division earlier this year, will assume the post in October.

news.headline: What Recent Price Swings Could Mean for P&G’s True Value in 2025
